task.title: Repairing a Jammed Radiator Tube
task.shortdesc: Replace a section of jammed radiator tube to restore proper circulation.

ul.li: Ensure the radiator is cool and drained

context.p: When a radiator tube is jammed and requires replacement to prevent freezing and circulation problems.

step.cmd: Cut the tube one inch above the jam
Cut the tube one inch below the jam

step.info: Ensure the solder creates a complete seal at both joints

result.p: The radiator tube will be clear and circulation will be restored.

postreq.note: Test the repair by running the engine until warm and checking for leaks.
